sourcesContent:
//import dollarUSLocale from "../../utils/dollarUSLocale"; import dollarUSLocaleNoDigits from "../../utils/dollarUSLocaleNoDigits"; import outputCSS from "../../scss/output.module.css"; const OutputBreakeven = ({ breakeven, reductionFromNGBRResale }) => { const financing3YearWResale = breakeven.breakeven3yearFinancingNoResale - reductionFromNGBRResale.financing36; const OutrightPurchaseWResale = breakeven.breakevenOutrightPurchaseNoResale - reductionFromNGBRResale.cashPurchase; const fPPWResale = breakeven.breakevenFPPNoResale - reductionFromNGBRResale.FPP; return (
  • Breakeven
  • Breakeven: Outright purchase - With resale {OutrightPurchaseWResale.toFixed(2)}
  • Breakeven: FPP - With resale {fPPWResale.toFixed(2)}
  • Breakeven: 3-year financing - With resale {financing3YearWResale.toFixed(2)}
); }; export default OutputBreakeven;
